> 1 minute ago, Mythos said:
> 
> 
> But the main problem I think about is: IF I change the title, then also the URL changes (right?).
> 

Yes, but also no. The forum ignores or re-writes anything after the thread ID, a dash, and one more character. So if the title changes, new links will look different, but old links still work. For example, <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> commonly exploits this to truncate links, like this:

- [https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/133971-*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/133971-*)

Yes, as [@HebaruSan](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/156657-hebarusan/)said, and I recently confirmed for myself, the thread is identified by the dash, not the title name.   So your links should still work.
